verses.verse: In the twenty-fifth <S%H8141>year<s%> of our <S%H1546>exile,<s%> at the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8141>year,<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H5221>taken,<s%> on that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was upon me and He <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H8033>there.<s%>

In the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> He <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5117>set<s%> me on a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> and on it to the <S%H5045>south<s%> [there was] a <S%H4011>structure<s%> like a <S%H5892>city.<s%>

So He <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H8033>there;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was a <S%H376>man<s%> whose <S%H4758>appearance<s%> was like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze,<s%> with a <S%H6616>line<s%> of <S%H6593>flax<s%> and a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>rod<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and he was <S%H5975>standing<s%> in the <S%H8179>gateway.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> with your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> with your <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H7760>give<s%> <S%H3820>attention<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> that I am going to <S%H7200>show<s%> you; for you have been <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H2008>here<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H7200>show<s%> [it] to you. <S%H5046>Declare<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H7200>see.<s%>"

And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was a <S%H2346>wall<s%> on the <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H1004>temple<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around,<s%> and in the man's <S%H3027>hand<s%> was a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>rod<s%> of <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> [each of which was] a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2948>handbreadth.<s%> So he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>thickness<s%> of the <S%H1140>wall,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>rod;<s%> and the <S%H6967>height,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>rod.<s%>

Then he <S%H935>went<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6440>faced<s%> <S%H6921>east,<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up its <S%H4609>steps,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>rod<s%> in <S%H7341>width;<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5592>threshold<s%> [was] <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>rod<s%> in <S%H7341>width.<s%>

And the <S%H8372>guardroom<s%> [was] <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>rod<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>rod<s%> <S%H7341>wide;<s%> and [there were] <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H8372>guardrooms.<s%> And the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> by the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H4480>facing<s%> <S%H1004>inward<s%> [was] <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>rod.<s%>
Then he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H4480>facing<s%> <S%H1004>inward,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>rod.<s%>

And he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and its <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%> And the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> was <S%H1004>faced<s%> <S%H1004>inward.<s%>

And the <S%H8372>guardrooms<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%> [numbered] <S%H7969>three<s%> on <S%H6311>each<s%> <S%H6311>side;<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> of them had the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H4060>measurement.<s%> The <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars<s%> also had the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H4060>measurement<s%> on <S%H6311>each<s%> <S%H6311>side.<s%>

And he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>width<s%> of the <S%H6607>gateway,<s%> <S%H8179><s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And [there was] a <S%H1366>barrier<s%> [wall] <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%> [wide] in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H8372>guardrooms<s%> on <S%H6311>each<s%> <S%H6311>side;<s%> and the <S%H8372>guardrooms<s%> [were] <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> [square] on <S%H6311>each<s%> <S%H6311>side.<s%>

And he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> from the <S%H1406>roof<s%> of the one <S%H8372>guardroom<s%> to the <S%H1406>roof<s%> of the other, a <S%H7341>width<s%> of twenty-five <S%H520>cubits<s%> from [one] <S%H6607>door<s%> to [the] <S%H6607>door<s%> <S%H5048>opposite.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> [high;] the <S%H8179>gate<s%> [extended] <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> to the <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillar<s%> of the <S%H2691>courtyard.<s%>

And [from] the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H9016>entrance<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> [was] <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And [there were] <S%H331>shuttered<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%> [looking] <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H8372>guardrooms,<s%> and <S%H413>toward<s%> their <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars<s%> <S%H6441>within<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around,<s%> and <S%H3651>likewise<s%> for the <S%H361>porches.<s%> And [there were] <S%H2474>windows<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H6441>inside;<s%> and on [each] <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillar<s%> [were] <S%H8561>palm<s%> <S%H8561>tree<s%> <S%H8561>ornaments.<s%>

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [there were] <S%H3957>chambers<s%> and a <S%H7531>pavement,<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around;<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> <S%H413>faced<s%> the <S%H7531>pavement.<s%>

And the <S%H7531>pavement<s%> ([that is,] the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H7531>pavement<s%>) [was] by the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H5980>corresponding<s%> to the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

Then he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>width<s%> from the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H2351>exterior<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on the <S%H6921>east<s%> and on the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

And [as for] the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6440>faced<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> he <S%H4058>measured<s%> its <S%H753>length<s%> and its <S%H7341>width.<s%>

And it had <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8372>guardrooms<s%> on <S%H6311>each<s%> <S%H6311>side;<s%> and its <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars<s%> and its <S%H361>porches<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> the same <S%H4060>measurement<s%> as the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%> Its <S%H753>length<s%> [was] <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>width<s%> twenty-five <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And its <S%H2474>windows,<s%> and its <S%H361>porches,<s%> and its <S%H8561>palm<s%> <S%H8561>tree<s%> <S%H8561>ornaments<s%> [had] the same <S%H4060>measurements<s%> as the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6440>faced<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and it was <S%H5927>reached<s%> by <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4609>steps,<s%> and its <S%H361>porch<s%> [was] in <S%H6440>front<s%> of them.

And the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> had a <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H5048>opposite<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> as well as [the <S%H8179>gate<s%>] on the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> from <S%H8179>gate<s%> to gate.

Then he <S%H1980>led<s%> me <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was a <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south;<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> its <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars<s%> and its <S%H361>porches<s%> according to <S%H428>those<s%> same <S%H4060>measurements.<s%>

And the gate and its <S%H361>porches<s%> had <S%H2474>windows<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> like <S%H428>those<s%> other <S%H2474>windows;<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> [was] <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and the <S%H7341>width<s%> twenty-five <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And [there were] <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%> <S%H5927>going<s%> up to it, and its <S%H361>porches<s%> [were] in <S%H6440>front<s%> of them; and it had <S%H8561>palm<s%> <S%H8561>tree<s%> <S%H8561>ornaments<s%> on its <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> on <S%H6311>each<s%> <S%H6311>side.<s%>

And the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> had a <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south;<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> from <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south,<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> by the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate;<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> according to <S%H428>those<s%> same <S%H4060>measurements.<s%>

Its <S%H8372>guardrooms<s%> also, its <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars,<s%> and its <S%H361>porches<s%> [were] according to <S%H428>those<s%> same <S%H4060>measurements.<s%> And the gate and its <S%H361>porches<s%> had <S%H2474>windows<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around;<s%> it [was] <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> and twenty-five <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>wide.<s%>
And [there were] <S%H361>porches<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around,<s%> <S%H2568>twenty-five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> and five <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>wide.<s%>

And its <S%H361>porches<s%> [were] <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> <S%H8561>tree<s%> <S%H8561>ornaments<s%> [were] on its <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars,<s%> and its <S%H4608>stairway<s%> had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east.<s%> And he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> according to <S%H428>those<s%> same <S%H4060>measurements.<s%>

Its <S%H8372>guardrooms<s%> also, its <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars,<s%> and its <S%H361>porches<s%> [were] according to <S%H428>those<s%> same <S%H4060>measurements.<s%> And the gate and its <S%H361>porches<s%> had <S%H2474>windows<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around;<s%> it [was] <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> and twenty-five <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>wide.<s%>

And its <S%H361>porches<s%> [were] toward the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> <S%H8561>tree<s%> <S%H8561>ornaments<s%> [were] on its <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars,<s%> on <S%H6311>each<s%> <S%H6311>side,<s%> and its <S%H4608>stairway<s%> had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%>
Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate;<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> [it] according to <S%H428>those<s%> same <S%H4060>measurements,<s%>

[with] its <S%H8372>guardrooms,<s%> its <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars,<s%> and its <S%H361>porches.<s%> And the gate had <S%H2474>windows<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around;<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> [was] <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and the <S%H7341>width<s%> twenty-five <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And its <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars<s%> [were] toward the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> <S%H8561>tree<s%> <S%H8561>ornaments<s%> [were] on its <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars<s%> on <S%H6311>each<s%> <S%H6311>side,<s%> and its <S%H4608>stairway<s%> had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%>

And a <S%H3957>chamber<s%> with its <S%H6607>doorway<s%> was by the <S%H9011>side<s%> <S%H9011>pillars<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates;<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H1740>rinse<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

And in the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> [were] <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> on <S%H6311>each<s%> <S%H6311>side,<s%> on which to <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> and the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering.<s%>

And on the <S%H2351>outer<s%> <S%H3802>side,<s%> as one <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H6607>gateway<s%> <S%H8179><s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables;<s%> and on the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> [were] <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables.<s%>

<S%H702>Four<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> [were] on <S%H6311>each<s%> <S%H6311>side<s%> <S%H3802>next<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate;<s%> [or,] <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> on which they <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> [sacrifices.]

And for the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> [there were] <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> of <S%H1496>hewn<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7341>wide,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H1363>high,<s%> on which they <S%H5117>lay<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%>

And the <S%H8240>double<s%> <S%H8240>hooks,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> in length, were <S%H3559>installed<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around;<s%> and on the <S%H7979>tables<s%> [was] the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H7133>offering.<s%>
